title: Google Business Profile Integration
description: Connect your Google Business Profile to sync reviews and respond directly from Avoqado

status.title: Connection Status
status.connected: Your Google Business Profile is connected

authorization.title: What you'll authorize:
authorization.readReviews: Read reviews from your Google Business Profile
authorization.postResponses: Post responses to reviews on your behalf

step1.title: 1. Click "Connect Google Business Profile"
step1.description: You'll be redirected to Google's authorization page

step2.title: 2. Sign in with your business Google account
step2.description: Use the account that manages your Google Business Profile

step3.title: 3. Grant permissions
step3.description: Allow Avoqado to read and respond to reviews

step4.title: 4. Select your business location
step4.description: If you manage multiple locations, choose the one for this venue

requirements.title: Requirements
requirements.verified: Your business must be verified on Google
requirements.owner: You must be the owner or manager of the Google Business Profile
requirements.active: Your Google Business Profile must be active and published

benefits.title: Benefits of Connecting
benefits.centralResponse: Respond to all reviews from one dashboard
benefits.analytics: Unified analytics across all review sources

errors.connectionFailed: Failed to connect Google Business Profile
errors.noLocations: No business locations found in your Google account
errors.unauthorized: You don't have permission to manage this Google Business Profile

disconnect.title: Disconnect Google Business Profile?
disconnect.description: Your existing synced reviews will remain in Avoqado, but new reviews won't be synced automatically. You can reconnect at any time.
